name: MakkaAzan
0:
”Alexa open Makka Azan”
”Alexa play Makka Azan”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: makka azan
des: All what you need to do is ask Alexa to open Makka Azan. You can set routine at each prayer time and setting an action to open Makka Azan. This will accordingly have the azan running automatically on time for prayers. The skill content is an audio format and it is fully in Arabic language. The skill is a single interaction using the English phrases "open Makka Azan" or play "Makka Azan" and the azan is played in Arabic language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
